name: Circa Blocks Demo
description:
A block pushing puzzle game where you change the angle of gravity of all the blocks to stack them on each other and reach the goal. The arrow keys switch the angle of gravity and the arrows on the left side of the screen go back or forth between levels. This is a demo and so only 9 of a planned 50 levels are in place. You can expect a full release by the end of November.

Music: https://itch.io/profile/tallbeard
